Text:
useless dupe of an old torrent.

the RTM was released 2009, meanwhile a service pack (SP1) and numerous hotfixes/updates where issued by Microsoft.

the RemoveWAT is a discontinued and no longer working method (read more at the forum)
use the loader by DAZ instead.
or as i did  use wocarson  guenuin validation and ure done for what ever u want
